title: Erigon appears as in and out of sync in beacon node
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `2022.08.2-alpha-35c4faa1`
OS & Version: Ubuntu Linux 22.04

#### Expected behaviour

The beacon node consistently shows Erigon to be fully synced all the time.

#### Actual behaviour

The beacon node alternatively shows that erigon is synced / not synced. I'm running Erigon + Lighthouse and Lighthouse alternates between these two messages:

```
WARN Execution endpoint is not synced
ERRO No synced execution endpoint
ERRO Error updating deposit contract cache
```

and 

```
WARN Syncing deposit contract block cache
INFO Ready for the merge
```

So it seems that there is a discrepancy between what is expected in terms of syncing, or that Erigon lets itself become out of sync too much.
